sqls.corr_index: select regexp_replace(a.key,'_.+','') as index1,regexp_replace(b.key,'_.+','') as index2,corr(cast(a.close as decimal(26,8)) , cast(b.close as decimal(26,8)) ) as corrratio from fund_catcher.index a inner join fund_catcher.index b on regexp_replace(a.key,'.+_','')=regexp_replace(b.key,'.+_','') where regexp_replace(a.key,'_.+','')>regexp_replace(b.key,'_.+','') group by regexp_replace(a.key,'_.+',''),regexp_replace(b.key,'_.+','')
sqls.create_worked_kzz: create external table if not exists workedkzz( bondcode string, name string, zaixianjia string, daoqijiazhi string, huishoujia string, yijialv string, period string, daoqiri string, nowyear string, frstvaluedate string, ratedes string ) stored as parquet
sqls.kzz_select: select l.bondcode as key,l.sname as name,l.zqnew as zaixianjia ,l.yjl as yijialv,m.mrtydate as daoqiri from kzzlb l left join kzzmx m on l.key=m.key where cast(l.zqnew as decimal(28,6))<=100.0 and cast(l.yjl as decimal(18,6))<=15 and ( l.delistdate is null or l.delistdate ='-' or l.delistdate ='' ) order by m.mrtydate
